description: Hostages spoke to thousands rallying in Tel Aviv two days after being released by Hamas
maintext: "In this kind of a fight, the center of gravity is the civilian population. And if you drive them into the arms of the enemy, you replace a tactical victory with a strategic defeat," Mr Austin said, drawing on his experience as a four-star general overseeing the battle against Islamic State militants.
title: Freed Israeli hostages call for remaining captives to be released
